title: [Ta'Illistim, Caear Courtyard]
description: The illuminated domes of Ta'Illistim Keep rise overhead, each one tiled and sparkling with an abundance of mosaic decoration.  Before the keep, the var widens to a half-moon shaped courtyard, which in turn is bordered by the edge of the city green.
